name: Skiplit
description:
Skiplit is a beautifully simple yet puzzlingly complex level game all about getting the ball into the goal, but you'll soon learn that simple doesn't mean easy.

To play, just swipe the ball into the goal. Bounce the ball off of walls and around obstacles to get it where you want. Be careful, though — you only have a few skips every level.

As you progress, you'll quickly discover that levels get more and more challenging when you are faced with limited bounces and:

• Different colored balls and goals
• Different types of balls
• Walls and goals that move just like balls
• Dangerous walls and balls
• Even more complications to discover!

Build, play, and share your own unique levels using the level designer, and play endless levels from anyone else around the world in the Skiplit Community!

Skiplit — the beautifully simple yet impossibly complex puzzle game for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.
